name: Residence Club mmv Le Hameau des Airelles

reviews.text: We travelled with family and booked two apartments - both had plenty of room, not like others we've stayed in in the past. First season it has been open so all details in the apartments were new - including good oven/microwave, TV and DVD player. Located next to slopes, but away from village centre. Great bakery next door and good restaurants in the village. Warm outdoor pool with small spa pool/sauna - limited locker availablity (somone had their camera stolen when not left in a locker).
reviews.title: Great accommodation

reviews.text: We haven't scored service because we didn't need it!
reviews.title: Good quality accomodation lacking atmosphere

reviews.text: Stayed here for 1 week from '31st Jan with my wife and two young children. Accomodation was good quality and clean certainly would agree with its 4* rating. However the reception staff were not very informative and lacked knowledge on ski equipment and ski lessons available in the area. The staff could do a little bit to make the atmosphere more socialable, a lovely lounge area but nothing organised (this could be different for the peak holiday weeks in February!). Being able to rent DVDs in reception was very handy and also the availability of board games was another plus too. Montgenevre itself is a fantastic ski resort my only complaint is the ski lessons are far too early 9:15 and also too short at 2.5 hours per day when compared to austria. That said I would definitly return to Montgenevre and the Les Hameau apartments in the future.
reviews.title: Good apartments
